meanings.sent1: She was compressing the clothes in her suitcase to make them fit.
meanings.sent2: The machine is compressing the metal sheets to form a solid shape.
meanings.sent3: The magician was compressing the colorful scarves into a tiny ball.
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret to a juicy burger is compressing the meat just right.
meanings.sent5: The hiker was compressing her sleeping bag to save space in her backpack.

meanings.definition: To reduce in size or volume
meanings.sent1: He was compressing the file to make it easier to send via email.
meanings.sent2: The scientist is compressing the data to fit more information in the report.
meanings.sent3: The balloon artist was compressing the long balloon into a small animal shape.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was compressing with joy at the sight of her family.
meanings.sent5: The vacuum cleaner is compressing the air to create suction for cleaning.

meanings.sent1: The student was compressing his notes to carry them all in one binder.
meanings.sent2: The architect is compressing the design to fit all the necessary elements in the building.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was compressing his jokes into a short stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to be compressing as the deadline for the project approached.
meanings.sent5: The artist is compressing the layers of paint to create a textured effect on the canvas.
